CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 28, 1945, pg. 13 reads: "Summertime! Taking it easy by the cool pool at North Park is winsome Mrs. Velma Robinson, who pauses to dream a bit about her hubby, who is serving with Uncle Sam's Army overseas. Her smile, her outfit, hairdo-well how 'bout it?"
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Velma Robinson wearing tropical shirt and pants, leaning back on grass in North Park
